strings.EC1: Organization name is required in both languages
strings.EC2: Value is required for Individual name
strings.EC3: Position name is required in both languages
strings.EC8: If you indicate 'Other Restrictions' in the 'Access Constraints' or 'Use Constraints' fields, the other constraints for accessing or using the resource should be explained here.
strings.EC9: Value is required for Online Resource URL
strings.EC10: Value is required for Topic Category
strings.EC11: Value is required for Use Limitation in both languages
strings.EC12: Value is required for Legal Access Constraints
strings.EC13: Value is required for Legal Use Constraints
strings.EC14: Value is required for Metadata publication date
strings.EC15: Value is required for Metadata creation date
strings.EC19: Value is not valid for Metadata Standard Name, should be 'North American Profile of ISO 19115:2003 - Geographic information - Metadata' in english and 'Profil nord-américain de la norme ISO 19115:2003 - Information géographique - Métadonnées' in french
strings.EC21: Value is required for distribution format - File name
strings.EC22: Value is required for distribution format - File version
strings.EC23: For online resources map services (OGC:WMS, Esri REST: Map Service protocols) the language attribute is required
strings.EC26: Organisation name in Government of Canada should have a title value as defined in the Registry of Applied Titles. See: http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC26GovEnglish: English value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC26GovFrench: French value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC26GovAllowedEnglish: English value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Government of Canada', 'Government of Alberta', 'Government of British Columbia', 'Government of Ontario', 'Government of Nova Scotia', 'Government of Prince Edward Island' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador' or 'Government of New Brunswick' or 'Government of Yukon' or 'Government and Municipalities of Québec'.
strings.EC26GovAllowedFrench: French value for Distributor Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Gouvernement du Canada', 'Gouvernement de l'Alberta', 'Gouvernement de la Colombie-Britannique', 'Gouvernement de l'Ontario', 'Gouvernement de la Nouvelle-Écosse', 'Gouvernement de l'Île-du-Prince-Édouard' or 'Gouvernement de Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador' or 'Gouvernement du Nouveau-Brunswick' or 'Gouvernement du Yukon' or 'Gouvernement et municipalités du Québec'.
strings.EC37GovEnglish: English value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC37GovFrench: French value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC37GovAllowedEnglish: English value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Government of Canada', 'Government of Alberta', 'Government of British Columbia', 'Government of Ontario', 'Government of Nova Scotia', 'Government of Prince Edward Island' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador' or 'Government of New Brunswick' or 'Government of Yukon' or 'Government and Municipalities of Québec'.
strings.EC37GovAllowedFrench: French value for Cited Responsible Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Gouvernement du Canada', 'Gouvernement de l'Alberta', 'Gouvernement de la Colombie-Britannique', 'Gouvernement de l'Ontario', 'Gouvernement de la Nouvelle-Écosse', 'Gouvernement de l'Île-du-Prince-Édouard' or 'Gouvernement de Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador' or 'Gouvernement du Nouveau-Brunswick' or 'Gouvernement du Yukon' or 'Gouvernement et municipalités du Québec'.
strings.EC38GovEnglish: English value for Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC38GovFrench: French value for Contact - Organisation name in 'Goverment of Canada' should have a valid title value. See http://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/fip-pcim/reg-eng.asp.
strings.EC38GovAllowedEnglish: English value for Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Government of Canada', 'Government of Alberta', 'Government of British Columbia', 'Government of Ontario', 'Government of Nova Scotia', 'Government of Prince Edward Island' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador' or 'Government of Newfoundland and Labrador' or 'Government of New Brunswick' or 'Government of Yukon' or 'Government and Municipalities of Québec'.
strings.EC38GovAllowedFrench: French value for Contact - Organisation name must be one of 'Gouvernement du Canada', 'Gouvernement de l'Alberta', 'Gouvernement de la Colombie-Britannique', 'Gouvernement de l'Ontario', 'Gouvernement de la Nouvelle-Écosse', 'Gouvernement de l'Île-du-Prince-Édouard' or 'Gouvernement de Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador' or 'Gouvernement du Nouveau-Brunswick' or 'Gouvernement du Yukon' or 'Gouvernement et municipalités du Québec'.
strings.EC27: Supplemental Information should be empty or filled in both languages
strings.EC31: Note (Other Constraints) is required in both languages
strings.EC32: Abstract is required in both languages
strings.EC33: Title is required in both languages
strings.SpatialRepresentation: Value is required for Spatial representation
strings.EC36: Keyword is required in both languages
strings.MaintenanceFrequency: Value is required for Maintenance and update frequency
strings.MapResourcesREST: REST Map Resources should be available in english and french
strings.MapResourcesRESTNumber: The number of ESRI REST Map Resources should be at most 2 (one for english and one for french)
strings.MapResourcesWMS: WMS Map Resources should be available in english and french
strings.MapResourcesWMSNumber: The number of WMS Map Resources should be at most 2 (one for english and one for french)
strings.ResourceDescription: Online resource description is not valid. The format should be: ContentType;Format;Lang
strings.ResourceDescriptionContentType: Online resource description content type is not valid. Valid values are: Web Service,Service Web,Dataset,Données,API,Application,Supporting Document,Document de soutien
strings.ResourceDescriptionFormat: Online resource description format is not valid. Valid values are:
strings.ResourceDescriptionLanguage: Online resource description language is not valid. Should be a comma separated values of ISO-LANG-3 codes
strings.OpenLicense: An Open Goverment Licence is required. Accepted English values: Open Government Licence - Canada (http://open.canada.ca/en/open-government-licence-canada) or Open Government Licence – Newfoundland and Labrador (https://opendata.gov.nl.ca/public/opendata/page/?page-id=licence) or Open Government Licence – Nova Scotia (https://novascotia.ca/opendata/licence.asp) or Open Government Licence – Ontario (https://www.ontario.ca/page/open-government-licence-ontario) or Open Government Licence – Prince Edward Island (https://www.princeedwardisland.ca/en/information/finance/open-government-licence-prince-edward-island) or Open Government Licence - British Columbia (https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/data/open-data/open-government-licence-bc) or Open Government Licence - Alberta (https://open.alberta.ca/licence) or Open Government Licence - New Brunswick (http://www.snb.ca/e/2000/data-E.html) or Open Government Licence - Yukon (https://open.yukon.ca/open-government-licence-yukon) or Creative Commons 4.0 Attribution (CC-BY) licence – Quebec (https://www.donneesquebec.ca/fr/licence/). Accepted French values : Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Canada (http://ouvert.canada.ca/fr/licence-du-gouvernement-ouvert-canada) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador (https://opendata.gov.nl.ca/public/opendata/page/?page-id=licence) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Nouvelle-Écosse (https://novascotia.ca/opendata/licence.asp) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Ontario (https://www.ontario.ca/fr/page/licence-du-gouvernement-ouvert-ontario) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert – Île-du-Prince-Édouard (https://www.princeedwardisland.ca/fr/information/finances/licence-du-gouvernement-ouvert-ile-du-prince-edouard) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Colombie-Britannique (https://www2.gov.bc.ca/gov/content/data/open-data/open-government-licence-bc) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Alberta (https://open.alberta.ca/licence) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Nouveau-Brunswick (http://www.snb.ca/f/2000/data-F.html) or Licence du gouvernement ouvert - Yukon (https://open.yukon.ca/fr/gouvernement-ouvert-licence-du-yukon) or Licence Creative Commons 4.0 Attribution (CC-BY) – Québec (https://www.donneesquebec.ca/fr/licence/)
strings.EndPosition: End position date should be after begin position
strings.BeginPositionFormat: Begin position format is not valid value
strings.EndPositionFormat: End position format is not valid value
strings.ECCountry: Country should have a value as defined in the ISO 3166 code list. See https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search/code/
strings.ECThesaurusOrg: Thesaurus cited responsible party organisation is required
strings.ECThesaurusRole: Thesaurus cited responsible party role is required
strings.ECThesaurusEmail: Thesaurus cited responsible party email is required
strings.ReferenceSystemInfo: Value is required for Reference System
strings.ReferenceSystemInfoCode: Value is required for Reference System - Code
strings.ReferenceSystemInfoCodeInvalid: Reference System Code should have the format EPSG:NUMBER / SR-ORG:NUMBER or have the value Proj4. Example: EPSG:4326
strings.InvalidHierarchyLevel: Hierarchy level code is not valid
strings.InvalidContactRole: Contact role code is not valid
strings.InvalidCitedResponsibleRole: Cited responsible role is not valid
strings.InvalidDistributorRole: Distributor role code is not valid
strings.InvalidAccessConstraints: Access constraints code is not valid
strings.InvalidUseConstraints: Use constraints code is not valid
strings.InvalidSpatialRepresentationType: Spatial representation code is not valid
strings.InvalidMaintenanceFrequency: Maintenance frequency code is not valid
strings.MissingContactMail: Contact - Electronic mail address is required
strings.MissingCitedResponsibleOrganisation: Cited responsible - Organisation name is required
strings.MissingCitedResponsibleMail: Cited responsible- Electronic mail address is required
strings.BeginDate: Value is required for Begin Date
strings.ContactOrganisationName: Contact - Organization name is required in both languages
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyOrganisationName: Cited Responsible Party - Organization name is required in both languages
strings.DistributorOrganisationName: Distributor - Organization name is required in both languages
strings.ContactPositionName: Contact - Position Name should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyPositionName: Cited Responsible Party - Position Name should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.DistributorPositionName: Distributor - Position Name should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.ContactElectronicMail: Contact - Electronic mail address is required in both languages
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyElectronicMail: Cited Responsible Party - Electronic mail address is required in both languages
strings.DistributorElectronicMail: Distributor - Electronic mail address is required in both languages
strings.ContactHoursOfService: Contact - Hours of service should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyHoursOfService: Cited Responsible Party - Hours of service should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.DistributorHoursOfService: Distributor - Hours of service should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.ContactDeliveryPoint: Contact - Delivery Point should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyDeliveryPoint: Cited Responsible Party - Delivery Point should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.DistributorDeliveryPoint: Distributor - Delivery Point should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.ContactPhone: Contact - Phone should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.CitedResponsiblePartyPhone: Cited Responsible Party - Phone should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.DistributorPhone: Distributor - Phone should be empty or filled in English and French
strings.DistributionFormatInvalid: Value for distribution format is not valid
strings.CoreSubjectThesaurusMissing: Core Subject Thesaurus keywords are mandatory
strings.GeographicExtentWestEast: Geographic extent - westbound longitude should be lower than eastbound longitude
strings.GeographicExtentNorthSouth: Geographic extent - southbound latitude should be lower than northbound latitude
